content: What are peoples' thoughts on having realm names in most/all of the email subject lines? e.g. for the digest email: "While youâ€™ve been away from {{ realm.name }}". I have a list of email subject lines both with and without realm names here: https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Zulip-email-subject-lines-aOsnkpu4NpK0Dfh1ZT0rY

My current thinking is to default to not have the realm name in subject line (most users will have only one account on one realm) and make a user notification setting to enable including realm names in subject lines for those users whose multiple Zulip accounts might cause confusion
I think that's potentially pretty reasonable. See also my suggestion that we consider using the string_id for this.
